price: Vallë, a nuk ju kam urdhëruar, o bijtë e Ademit, që të mos e adhuroni djallin, se ai është vërtet armik i hapët juaji,
arabic: ۞ أَلَمۡ أَعۡهَدۡ إِلَيۡكُمۡ يَٰبَنِيٓ ءَادَمَ أَن لَّا تَعۡبُدُواْ ٱلشَّيۡطَٰنَۖ إِنَّهُۥ لَكُمۡ عَدُوّٞ مُّبِينٞ

version.title: Albanian Translation - Hasan Nahi
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Albanian by Hasan Nahi, published by Albanian Institute of Islamic Thought and Civilization, printed in 2006.

meta.transliteration: alam aʿhad ilaykum yābanī ādama an lā taʿbudū al-shayṭāna innahu lakum ʿaduwwun mubīnun
